Joplin.Ozark Christian College:
Ozark Christian College is a private, not-for-profit college in Joplin, Missouri affiliated with the Restoration Movement of Christian churches and churches of Christ.


== History ==
Ozark Bible College was established in Bentonville, Arkansas, on June 12, 1942. The school was committed to training men and women for Christian service by teaching the Word of Christ in the Spirit of Christ.
